page.title: 19Laceby Acres-Television
page.content: Television broadcasts in 1985 are entertaining,most children's lives evolve around them.There are a wide selection of broadcasts to watch,some may come under these categories,drama,comedy,light entertainment,mystery and suspense.In the age group 11-12 years the title of the programme we are previewing is called "The Young Ones".It is centred round four characters who are students at Scrumpback College and have a chaotic time in their ram-shackled old dump of a house.The first character has a serious and funny side,he tends to be the cool,the second is a hippy who is always being picked on by the third who is a common British punk(non conformer).The last character is a young student who likes to think he rules the house.Parents feel that it gives people the wrong attitude.
